description:
Charao, Supoo, and Otao discuss who in their class has the biggest boobs.
Seeing Galko’s boobs sitting on the desk, Charao says he has no doubt it’s Galko.
However, Supoo comments that Nikuko has large boobs too. Their discussion gets heated...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est vrai que t’as une sale tête au réveil ?
Is It True You Have Horrible Bed-head?
أمن الصحيح أنّك تعاني من حال شعرك بعد النوم؟
ヒドい寝ぐせって本当ですか?
